articles.title: Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Seyed Mohsen Emadi hosted a reception at his embassy on Friday to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among those present on invitation were Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and concurrently minister of Higher Education who is chairman of the Iran-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group, and Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries.
					
					 The Iranian ambassador said in his speech that they are pleased to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 He noted that the relations between the two countries were provided by Leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran Seyed Ali Khamenei and President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He expressed the will to boost the cooperation between the two countries, saying that the Iranian people are attaching great importance to the relations with the DPRK.
					
					 Ri Yong Ho said it is a token of reverence for Kim Jong Il that the Iranian friends are significantly celebrating the Day of the Shining Star together with the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's exploits for the development of the friendly relations between the two countries and the global cause of independence will be immortal, he said.
					
					 He reiterated that the Korean people would make all efforts to develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries provided by the great leaders of the DPRK together with the high-ranking leaders of Iran.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies Abroad
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies Abroad
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties and organizations and personages of various countries visited the DPRK embassies in their countries between Feb. 10 and 16 in celebration of the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The visitors laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They included delegations of parties and organizations of Mexico and Nigeria and personages of Cuba, Bangladesh, Nepal, Iran, Myanmar and DR Congo.

articles.title: Spokesman for C.C., DFRK Hits out at S. Korean FM's Remarks against DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for C.C., DFRK Hits out at S. Korean FM's Remarks against DPRK
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet foreign minister of south Korea, called for imposing tougher "sanctions" and "pressure" upon the DPRK during his junkets to various countries including Germany where the Group of 20 Foreign Ministers Meeting and Munich Security Meeting were held. He spouted rubbish, regardless of whom he was meeting, that the nuclear issue of the north is like a time-bomb, the north's nukes will reach the critical phase of actual deployment in one or two years and now is the last opportunity to stop it.
					 In this regard, a spokesman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) issued a statement which said:
					
					 What Yun uttered to take issue with the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK is no more than nonsense by an idiot ignorant of how peace is being preserved on the Korean peninsula and how things are going in the world.
					
					 The pro-U.S. psychopaths living on flattering the outsiders including the U.S., utterly indifferent to the national interests, only bring disgrace to the nation and cause trouble.
					
					 The traitors like Yun are busy asking the outside forces to cooperate in escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north in a bid to prolong their remaining days, though fated to be thrown overboard together with Park Geun Hye. But they will meet bitterer disgrace and humiliation and miserable destruction for doing so.
					
					 The hostile forces' desperate moves to stifle the DPRK will only embolden it to rapidly emerge as the strongest power of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 The puppet regime's ridiculous solicitation for cooperation in the moves for stifling the DPRK is bound to go bankrupt, cursed by the world public.

articles.title: NRC Sheds Light on Despicable Nature of "Liberal Korea Party"
articles.content:
NRC Sheds Light on Despicable Nature of "Liberal Korea Party"
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The National Reconciliation Council (NRC) issued a memorandum Thursday revealing the despicable nature of the "Liberal Korea Party" in south Korea which has committed thrice-cursed crimes indelible down to generations to come.
					 According to the memorandum, the "Liberal Korea Party" (LKP) is a traitorous party accustomed to flunkeyism and submission.
					
					 The party has changed its name many times from the Liberal Party, which was formed to prop up the pro-U.S. regime with Syngman Rhee as a puppet under the scenario worked out by the U.S., into Democratic Republican Party, Democratic Justice Party, Democratic Liberal Party, New Korea Party, Grand National Party, Saenuri Party and then Liberal Korea Party. But it has never changed in its dirty nature as a group of pro-American traitors.
					
					 The wild act of this traitorous party reached the extremes when it was called Saenuri Party.
					
					 After setting it as its "state policy" to tighten alliance with the U.S., the party extended to an indefinite period the duration of the "wartime operation control" though it was made to be taken over from the U.S. master even for the mere form's sake. And it turned the cradle of life of the nation into a worldwide nuclear confrontational theatre by deciding to introduce THAAD, nuclear war monster of the U.S., into south Korea.
					
					 This party has been long accustomed to pro-Japanese treachery. It described the thrice-cursed act of glossing over the shuddering crimes committed by the Japanese reactionaries in the past, including the crimes related to the sexual slavery, as a "diplomatic and historical achievement" and pressed for the conclusion of an agreement on the protection of military intelligence with Japan, thus playing the role of guiding invaders.
					
					 Since its first predecessor, the LKP has viciously strangled independence, democracy, justice and truth while resorting to hysteric acts putting the fascist Nazis into the shade.
					
					 At the time of Liberal Party, it enforced fascist dictatorship by invoking the "Security Law" and concocted unprecedented fascist evil laws after May 15 military coup of traitor Park Chung-hee, thus turning south Korea into the grave of human rights and democracy.
					
					 After it changed its name into Democratic Justice Party, it cooked up more than 100 fascist evil laws, turning south Korea into a prison without bars.
					
					 The Saenuri Party even concocted "anti-terrorism law", the second "Security Law", in order to stamp out the progressive and democratic forces advocating national unity and reunification.
					
					 Under the dictatorship of the fascist clique, the activities of the trade union of teachers demanding independence, democracy and reunification and the programs and activities of Jaju Minbo were outlawed and banned.
					
					 In 2013 the minutes of the north-south summit talks were deliberately discharged and distorted to suppress the progressive and pro-reunification forces as "spokesmen for the north".
					
					 The party actively supported Park Geun Hye's moves for "state compilation" of history textbooks which justified pro-Japanese, pro-U.S. and "yusin" dictators and incited confrontation with the fellow countrymen, and came out as a shock brigade for executing it.
					
					 Citing the facts that LKP turned south Korea into the living hell, the memorandum continued:
					
					 Now the unemployed number more than 4.5 million, the underemployed 10 million, homeless old people 885 000 and those without their own houses more than 8.5 million families in south Korea.
					
					 The whole south Korean land suffers from unpopular rule such as worst working conditions, forced dismissal and wage cut.
					
					 Noble campus is used as a means for money-making and the majority of people without provision of elementary living allowances suffer death when they get sick.
					
					 The traitorous party cooked up in succession unpopular evil laws crudely violating the right to existence of the popular masses, pushing people into destitution. Through the privatization of public fields, it further strangled the windpipe of the toiling masses who barely made their living.
					
					 It slandered the struggle of workers and other people of various strata demanding the right to existence, thus making the storm of fascist suppression rage.
					
					 The Saenuri Party's despicable behavior at the time of the shocking ferry Sewol disaster makes the world tremble with anger even today.
					
					 The predecessors of the LKP stubbornly stood against the national unity and reunification generation after generation.
					
					 Traitor Syngman Rhee set "unification by prevailing over communism" as "state policy" and traitor Park Chung-hee built concrete walls along the Military Demarcation Line and traitors Chun Doo-hwan, Roh Tae Woo, Kim Young Sam proposed confrontation of social systems and the proposal for unification through absorption as "north policy". The predecessors of this party all took the lead in promotion of those policies with their sleeves rolled up.
					
					 The party downplayed the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, an action programme for implementing the said declaration, as "pathetic unification theory" and "tactics of reunification front of the north" and totally denied them. Instead it set as its "north policy" the "confidence-building process" and "Dresden declaration" and "the doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification", the policy of confrontation between social systems touted by traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 In order to undermine the single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK and realize the pipe dream of regime change, the party squandered a great amount of fund on anti-DPRK plot-breeding organizations and egged human scum on to kick up the racket of scattering leaflets slandering the DPRK.
					
					 After setting up the UN "office on human rights in north" in Seoul, the party cooked up "bill on human rights in the north" and "anti-terrorism law", anti-DPRK confrontational evil laws, in March last year and totally shut down the Kaesong Industrial Zone, the last lifeline of the north-south relations.
					
					 The records of confrontation with the fellow countrymen committed by the LKP also include its criminal war moves against the north.
					
					 In August 2015 the Park Geun Hye group fabricated a "case of mine provocation by the north" and randomly opened fire into the areas of the north side in a bid to ignite a new war. At that time the LKP proposed a "resolution on denouncing the north's provocation of planting mine in DMZ area" as a party opinion and resorted to escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Whenever the U.S. openly disclosed its scheme for preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, the Park Geun Hye group actively supported it and called for "massive punishment" and trumpeted about "south Korea-U.S. alliance".
					
					 The LKP denounced opposition parties and people from all walks of life standing against THAAD deployment as "sordid forces" and "forces creating social unrest", thus fanning up the atmosphere of suppression.
					
					 The party is the setter of a new record in corruption and irregularities.
					
					 Clear evidence is that Park Geun Hye and her close confidants, who are called No. 1 party members, have been involved in MIR foundation and K Sports Foundation, the hideous corruption and irregularities case.
					
					 The party is a swindling political party, money-swayed party, thief party, cheating party, money all-mighty party, and sex-crazy party.
					
					 It is a eunuchoid party of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 It is utterly amazing that in the present era of high civilization there exist modern-day eunuchs who serve the dragon lady hardly worth a human being as a queen for her indolent, depraved and corrupt life.
					
					 Those eunuchs were mostly from the Liberal Korea Party, the memorandum said, citing facts.
					
					 Now the party is making desperate efforts to prolong its dirty remaining days but it can never cover up its despicable nature and crimes, it noted, stressing:
					
					 Syngman Rhee sold pancake stuffed with bean jam for his living after being rejected by his people and ousted from his homeland, and Park Chung-hee was shot to death by his close confidant and Chun Doo-hwan and Roh Tae Woo had to live in Paekdam Temple and serve a prison life. Such pitiful end is unavoidable fate of the Liberal Korea Party.

articles.title: Women's Basketball Match between DPRK and China
articles.content:
Women's Basketball Match between DPRK and China
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A friendly game between the DPRK's Pothonggang women's basketball team and China's Jiangsu provincial women's basketball team took place at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Friday.
					 Watching the game were Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs who is vice-chairman of the DPRK Basketball Association, officials concerned and sportspersons and Ambassador Li Jinjun and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: DPRK's Football Teams Will Take Part in 2017 AFC Cup
articles.content:
DPRK's Football Teams Will Take Part in 2017 AFC Cup
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The April 25 and the Kigwancha teams of the DPRK will participate in the 2017 AFC Cup.
					 According to the result of a draw, both teams belong to Group I together with the Erchim team of Mongolia.
					
					 The April 25 team will play home match with Erchim team on March 14 and away match on May 17 and the Kigwancha team on April 4 and on May 31 respectively.
					
					 The first match between the April 25 team and the Kigwancha team will take place in Pyongyang on April 18 and the second one on May 3.
					
					 Both of teams have proved successful in major national games, including the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games and the DPRK Championships, every year.
					
					 Last year, the April 25 team took the first place in the men's premier soccer league for Torch Cup and the Kigwancha team in men's football event of the sports team section during the 13th People's Games.
					
					 The April 25 team advanced to the semifinals of Asia Club Championship in 1991.

articles.title: Socialist Emulation for Increased Production in Agriculture in 2016 Reviewed
articles.content:
Socialist Emulation for Increased Production in Agriculture in 2016 Reviewed
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture here on Friday to review the socialist emulation for increased production in the field of agriculture in 2016.
					 Officials and other agricultural workers made dynamic efforts to overfulfill their plans for the production of grain, livestock, etc. last year.
					
					 Grain production plans were overfulfilled by the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, the Sinam Co-op Farm in Ryongchon County, the Samjigang Co-op Farm in Jaeryong County, the Unhung Co-op Farm in Thaechon County and the Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County.
					
					 Dozens of units succeeded in boosting the per-hectare yield of grain through the socialist emulation for increased production among cities and counties widely known for rich harvest.
					
					 Stock-breeding bases such as the Kanggye Pig Farm and the Hungju Chicken Farm increased the production of meat and eggs and Taedonggang and Kosan combined fruit farms and others hit their fruit production targets.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ri Chol Man, department director of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Ko In Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet and concurrently minister of Agriculture, officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and officials and agricultural workers of those units which took part in the emulation.
					
					 The standing was announced and citations and rotating silk banner were conferred upon the successful participants.
					
					 The general outlines for the emulation for 2017 were made public at the meeting.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Festival of Pyongyang University of Architecture
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Festival of Pyongyang University of Architecture
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The 32nd Sci-Tech Festival of the Pyongyang University of Architecture took place on Feb. 22-24.
					 It was attended by teachers, researchers, graduate students and students of the university.
					
					 The festival, divided into panels of architecture, city administration, land and environment, construction engineering, construction administration, building materials, construction machinery, and information engineering, involved presentation and exhibition of sci-tech achievements and new technology exchange.
					
					 Presented to it were more than 190 sci-tech proposals and successes and experience were exchanged.

articles.title: Korean Mat-craft with Long History
articles.content:
Korean Mat-craft with Long History
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Mat tops all the grass-works of Korea with a long history. The Korean mat, in general, is weaved with strips of sedge or rush stalks. And sedge mat has been regarded as the best for its lightness, softness and elasticity.
					 From olden times, the Korean nation has spread mats over floor-heated rooms or floor and used mats with flower patterns, in particular, for guests or ceremonies.
					
					 Mat got popular during the Three Kingdoms (early 3rd century B.C.-middle 7th century A.D.) and in that period a governmental organ was established to specially preside over grass-craft. 
					
					 The production and usage of mat had further increased in the period of Koryo (918-1392).
					
					 During the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910), it had been produced in most parts of the country.
					
					 Especially, mats produced in Phyongan, Hwanghae, Jolla and Kyongsang provinces were very famous across the country and mats with flower patterns highly appreciated even in neighboring countries.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Take Strategic Option with Deep Thought
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Take Strategic Option with Deep Thought
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Extremely provocative remarks are heard in the U.S.
					 Brass hats of the U.S. military said that the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills would be kicked off in south Korea before long and they were examining the proposal to massively mobilize nuclear strategic assets including nuclear-powered carrier Carl Vinson, nuclear strategic bombers B-52 and B-1B and stealth fighter F-22.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the U.S. policy toward the DPRK to bring down the latter by force of arms remains unchanged and the U.S. wants a war, not peace.
					
					 The U.S. is groundlessly pulling up the DPRK over its measures for self-defense while talking about "provocations and "threat". This is nothing but a cynical ploy to cover up its true colors as wrecker of peace and shift the blame on to the DPRK.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to oppose the confrontation of force and preserve peace on the Korean peninsula through dialogue and negotiations. 
					
					 However, the DPRK cannot take only a fence-sitting attitude towards the U.S. working with bloodshot eyes to swallow up the former.
					
					 Unless the U.S. makes a switchover in its policy toward the DPRK and stop the saber-rattling to invade the DPRK, the DPRK will steadily bolster up its capability for self-defence with the nuclear force as a pivot.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the reality and stop going reckless and take a proper strategic option with deep thought.
					
					 This would do the U.S. good, too.

articles.title: S. Koreans Declare Will to Struggle for Pan-national Conference
articles.content:
S. Koreans Declare Will to Struggle for Pan-national Conference
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Taejon headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Taejon on Feb. 21 at which it expressed the will to actively turn out in the struggle for successfully opening the pan-national conference for peace and reunification of the country and development of the north-south relations, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News. 
					 Speakers at the meeting called upon all the people to unite for dawn of reunification and put an end to the nightmarish era of division that has lasted for more than seven decades and build a new society where the people become its master and a new era of reunified country.
					
					 They declared they would conduct dynamic activities to build up strong public opinion for peace against war such as actions against war drills and THAAD deployment, scrap the humiliating "agreement" on the sexual slavery issue and the agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan and check the moves for tri-angular military alliance.
					
					 A resolution for successful pan-national conference was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: S. Korea: Extension of Investigation Period of Special Prosecution Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Extension of Investigation Period of Special Prosecution Urged
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- An editorial of the south Korean internet paper Voice of People urged the extension of investigation period of the special prosecution for the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal" on February 22.
					 The editorial expressed anxiety over the investigation of the special prosecution that could end without probing the truth about the scandal as Hwang Kyo An and the conservative ruling party oppose the said extension and revision of the law on special inspection.
					
					 The editorial explained the following points which Hwang should not misjudge:
					
					 First, even "prime minister" is no exception in facing anger and judgment of the people.
					
					 Second, the investigation would be done although the "prime minister" denies.
					
					 The people would struggle to the end to condemn Park and Choe and their followers and remove deep-rooted evils.
					
					 Whether to accept the order of history or face the judgment of the people is entirely up to the "prime minister".

articles.title: S. Korean Body Declares 48-Hour Emergency Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Declares 48-Hour Emergency Action
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The emergency people's action for the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Thursday at which it declared the launch of "48-hour emergency action for impeachment and arrest of Park Geun Hye! Extension of special investigation!", according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 The 48-hour emergency action is launched to achieve bigger victory ahead of the impeachment of Park Geun Hye, the organization said.
					
					 At the end of the press conference, the organization began the emergency action by staging a march toward the "government" building and the "Constitutional Court" in demand of the extension of the period for special investigation and early trial for Park's impeachment.
					
					 Youth and students, workers and other masses will reportedly join in the action.

articles.title: Bird Flu Keeps Spreading in South Jolla Province
articles.content:
Bird Flu Keeps Spreading in South Jolla Province
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Bird flu broke out in South Jolla Province again, making people uneasy, said the south Korean CBS on Feb. 22.
					 A veterinary examination of ducks on a duck farm in Haenam County of the province confirmed the spread of bird flu virus there. 
					
					Consequently, at least 23,000 ducks were culled.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Spain
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was brought out in booklet by the Anfer Publishing House of Spain on February 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998), clarifies the five-point policy for great national unity, important guidelines in achieving the great national unity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Works Introduced by Italian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Works Introduced by Italian Organization
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea of Italy posted leader Kim Jong Il's works "Let Us Further Strengthen Our Single-Hearted Unity and Give Full Play to the Korean-Nation-First Spirit", "Let Us Live Not Merely for Today But for Tomorrow" and "On Imbuing the Whole Society with Communist Moral Traits" on its website on February 15 to mark the Day of the Shining Star, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Organization of DR Congo
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of DR Congo for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star issued a bulletin on February 1 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin carried articles subtitled "Defender of Socialism" and "Exploits for the cause of national reunification" under the main title of "On the occasion of the 75th birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people; leader Kim Jong Il's idea and exploits will be immortal".
					
					 It elaborated on the fact that Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the prosperity of socialist Korea, the reunification of the country and the human cause of independence.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un, the great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche, is now at the head of the Korean revolution. He is a prominent great man of Korea identical to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under his guidance, the Korean people will surely accomplish the cause of building a socialist power, the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: CRN revela atributo asqueroso del "Partido de Corea Libre"
articles.content:
CRN revela atributo asqueroso del "Partido de Corea Libre"
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional publico el dia 23 un memorandum que revela el atributo repugnante del "Partido de Corea Libre" del Sur de Corea.
					Segun el documento, esa agrupacion vendepatria tiene el abultado antecedente de actos serviles y sumisos a grandes potencias.
					
					Su nombre inicial fue el "Partido Libre" fabricado segun el guion de EE.UU. para mantener el "poder" proyanqui y titere de Syngman Rhee, comienza el texto y prosigue:
					
					Desde entonces, fue renombrado en varias ocasiones como "Partido Democratico Republicano", "Partido Democrata Liberal", "Partido de Nueva Corea", "Gran Partido Nacional", "Partido Saenuri", "Partido de Corea Libre". Pero, nunca se ha cambiado su naturaleza de guarida de traidores proyanquis y cuartel general de la politica servil a grandes potencias.
					
					Sus actos traidores se tornaron peores cuando tenia el cartel de "Partido Saenuri".
					
					Definio como "politica estatal" el "fortalecimiento de alianza" con EE.UU., aplazo por tiempo indefinido el periodo de traspaso del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra que tenia que recibir formalmente de su amo gringo y convirtio el territorio nacional en el escenario de confrontacion nuclear mundial al decidir la introduccion en el suelo surcoreano del THAAD, equipo de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Describio como "exitos diplomaticos e historicos" sus imperdonables actos de tolerar el crimen de esclavitud sexual y los otros sangrientos cometidos en el siglo pasado por los reaccionarios japoneses y firmo con estos el convenio de proteccion de informaciones militares abriendoles asi el paso de nueva agresion.
					
					Desde su fundacion hasta la fecha, el "Partido de Corea Libre" vino acabando con la independencia y democracia y con la justicia y verdad mediante una represion histerica de que se avergonzaria hasta el partido nazifascista.
					
					En el periodo de "Partido Libre", practico la dictadura fascista en virtud de la "ley de seguridad" y despues del golpe militar de Estado del 16 de Mayo ejecutado por el traidor Park Chung Hee, invento infames leyes sin precedentes para convertir el suelo surcoreano en la tumba de derechos humanos y democracia.
					
					Despues, fabrico mas de 100 leyes fascistas que transformaron el Sur de Corea en una gran carcel sin rejas.
					
					El "Partido Saenuri" invento la "ley de prevencion del terrorismo", conocida como segunda "ley de seguridad", para exterminar las fuerzas progresistas y democraticas que abogan por la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					Bajo la dictadura de la camarilla fascista, el Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes, que reclamaba la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion, ha sido calificado de extralegal mientras el periodico Jaju Minbo tuvo que suspender la publicacion al ser cuestionados su programa y actividades.
					
					En 2013, reprimio a las fuerzas progresistas estigmatizandolas de "portavoces del Norte (de Corea)" al ventilar y tergiversar deliberadamente hasta las notas del dialogo de la Cumbre Norte-Sur.
					
					Sirvio de ejecutor material del proyecto de Park Geun-hye sobre la "redaccion de los manuales de historia por el Estado", el cual parte del objetivo de alabar los actos projaponeses y proyanquis y la dictadura de "Yusin" (renovacion).
					
					El "Partido de Corea Libre" es el que ha convertido el suelo surcoreano en la tierra infernal.
					
					Ahora, en el Sur de Corea hay mas de 4 millones 500 mil desempleados, 10 millones subempleados, 885 mil ancianos vagabundos y mas de 8 millones 500 mil familias sin hogares.
					
					Todo el suelo surcoreano sufre las consecuencias de politicas antipopulares tales como peores condiciones de trabajo, despido, reduccion de salario, etc.
					
					Los sagrados centros de educacion se convierten en los espacios de lucro mientras la abrumadora mayoria de la poblacion no tiene otro remedio que morirse cuando enferma.
					
					La agrupacion traidora depaupero la vida del pueblo inventando sin cesar las infames leyes antipopulares que suprimen el derecho a la vida de las masas trabajadoras e impulso por la fuerza la privatizacion de sectores publicos que estrangula aun mas a las masas trabajadores que viven ya en extrema miseria.
					
					Levanto la ola de represion fascista contra los obreros y otros sectores de la poblacion que demandaban el derecho a la subsistencia.
					
					Todo el mundo se tiembla de indignacion hasta ahora cuando recuerda lo que hizo el "Partido Saenuri" durante la tragedia del ferry "Sewol".
					
					Los antecesores del "Partido de Corea Libre" son connotados elementos que impidieron la unidad y reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					Syngman Rhee presento como "politica estatal" la "unificacion basada en la victoria sobre el comunismo" y Park Chung Hee dividio en dos partes el territorio nacional construyendo un muro de hormigon a lo largo de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					Ademas, Chun Doo Hwan, Roh Thae Woo y Kim Young Sam tomaron como "politica sobre el Norte" sus proyectos de enfrentamiento de regimenes y unificacion mediante la absorbicion.
					
					Todos ellos contaron con el respaldo activo de los compinches del actual "Partido de Corea Libre".
					
					Esta organizacion nego totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de implementacion de la primera, desvirtuandolas como "teoria de unificacion sentimental" y "tactica del Norte sobre el frente unido".
					
					Y presento como "politica sobre el Norte" las doctrinas de confrontacion de regimenes de la traidora Park Geun-hye como "proceso de confianza", la "Declaracion de Dresden" y "Thong-il Taebak" (cajon de tesoros para la unificacion).
					
					Suministro grandes sumas a las entidades intrigantes anti-RPDC para romper la unidad monolitica de nuestro ejercito y pueblo y realizar el absurdo sueno de derrocar nuestro regimen e instigo a las escorias humanas a lanzar volantes de contenido anti-RPDC.
					
					Instalo en Seul la "Oficina de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU, invento en marzo del ano pasado la "ley de DDHH del Norte" y la "ley de prevencion del terrorismo" y cerro totalmente hasta la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, ultimo hilo de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					El "Partido de Corea Libre" es afamado tambien por sus febriles maniobras belicas contra el Norte.
					
					En agosto de 2015, cuando la banda de Park Geun-hye invento el "incidente de provocacion del Norte con la mina" y se volvio frenetica para provocar nueva guerra disparando proyectiles hacia el territorio de la RPDC, propuso como teoria partidista el "proyecto de resolucion para condenar la provocacion del Norte con la mina en la Zona Desmilitarizada".
					
					Cada vez que EE.UU. exponia abiertamente la intencion de ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC, la banda de Park la apoyo activamente reclamando el "castigo de gran envergadura" y elogiando la "alianza Sur de Corea-EE.UU."
					
					Ahora, fomenta el ambiente de represion violenta tildando de "fuerzas malsanas que forman la inestabilidad social" a los partidos opositores y varios sectores que rechazan el emplazamiento de THAAD.
					
					El "Partido de Corea Libre" es el campeon en los casos de corrupcion e irregularidades. Lo comprueba el caso de las Fundaciones MIR y K-Sports, gran escandalo de corrupcion en que estan involucrados Park Geun-hye, "militante No.1 del partido", y sus colaboradores.
					
					Ademas, se gano muchos apodos bochornosos como "estafador politico", "plutocrata", "ladron", "lujurioso", etc.
					
					En efecto, es el colectivo de eunucos al servicio de Park Geun-hye.
					
					El fin tragico de sus predecesores como Syngman Rhee, Park Chung Hee, Chun Doo Hwan y Roh Thae Woo es precisamente el destino fatal del "Partido de Corea Libre".

articles.title: Portavoz de FDRP condena a Yun Pyong Se que mendiga la cooperacion anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz de FDRP condena a Yun Pyong Se que mendiga la cooperacion anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores del Sur de Corea, Yun Pyong Se, giro por varios paises inclusive Alemania, sede de la reunion de cancilleres del G-20 y la otra de seguridad de Munich, mendigando las "sanciones" y "presion" mas fuertes contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, mientras que dijo que "el problema nuclear del Norte (de Corea) deviene la bomba de reloj", "faltan solo unos anos hasta la ubicacion de las armas nucleares del Norte" y "ahora es la ultima oportunidad".
					Esta ofensiva verbal contra el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC no pasa de ser sofisterias de los estupidos que no saben como se defiende la paz de la Peninsula Coreana ni la situacion del mundo.
					
					Asi insiste el portavoz del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria en su declaracion fechada el 23 y continua:
					
					Los psicopatas proyanquis, que no tienen la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y el interes de la nacion, sino mantienen su vida apoyandose en el servilismo a EE.UU. constituyen la verguenza de la nacion y fuente de desastres.
					
					Aunque la banda de traidores incluyendo hacen tesoneros esfuerzos por mantener mas su vida sucia, lo cual les daran solo la verguenza y humillacion y la destruccion miserable.
					
					Cuanto mas se recrudecen las maniobras de las fuerzas hostiles, tanto mas se fortalecera la RPDC, potencia nuclear, basandose en el autofortalecimiento.
					
					Las maniobras de la banda surcoreana para lograr la cooperacion anti-RPDC no podran evitar un amargo fracaso.

articles.title: Equipos de futbol de RPDC participaran en la Copa de CAF de 2017
articles.content:
Equipos de futbol de RPDC participaran en la Copa de CAF de 2017
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- El equipo 25 de Abril y el Kigwancha de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea participaran en la Copa de la CAF de 2017.
					Segun el sorteo, los dos equipos coreanos estan integrados en el Grupo 9 (Asia oriental) junto con el Erchim de Mongolia.
					
					El equipo 25 de Abril entablara el partido en casa con su rival mongol el 14 de marzo, y el de gira el 17 de mayo, mientras el equipo Kigwancha los hara el 31 de mayo y el 4 de abril.
					
					Los partidos entre los dos equipos coreanos se realizaran en esta capital el 18 de abril y el 3 de mayo.
					
					Los equipos coreanos, reconocidos como fuertes en el pais, formaron a los futbolistas sobresalientes como Hong Yong Jo y Pak Kwang Ryong y se destacaron en las competencias nacionales como el Torneo Deportivo por el Premio Mangyongdae y el Campeonato Nacional que se efectuan cada ano. 
					
					En el ano pasado, el equipo 25 de abril ocupo el primer lugar en la competencia (M) de primera categoria por la Copa Hwaebul, y el Kigwancha en el partido de futbol de la rama de conjuntos deportivos de la XIII Competencia Deportiva del Pueblo. 
					
					El 25 de Abril habia salido a la semifinal del Campeonato Asiatico de Club de Futbol de 1991.

articles.title: Balancean emulacion socialista de aumento de produccion de rama agricola de 2016
articles.content:
Balancean emulacion socialista de aumento de produccion de rama agricola de 2016
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el balance de emulacion socialista de aumento de produccion de la rama agricola de 2016.
					En el ano pasado los funcionarios y trabajadores de la rama agricola desarrollaron una energica campana para sobrecumplir el plan de produccion agricola como los cereales y los productos pecuarios.
					
					En esta campana sobresalieron las granjas cooperativas de Migok de la ciudad de Sariwon, Sinam del distrito de Ryongchon, Samjigang del distrito de Jaeryong, Unhung del distrito de Thaechon y Tongbong del distrito de Hamju.
					
					Y decenas de unidades participaron en la emulacion entre las ciudades y distritos, destacados en la rama, lograron considerables exitos concentrando las fuerzas en la mejora del rendimiento de la cosecha por una hectarea.
					
					Las bases ganaderas incluyendo la Planta Porcina de Kanggye y la Granja Avicola de Hungju incrementaron la produccion de carne y huevo y las granjas fruticolas como las Granjas Combinadas Fruticolas Taedonggang y de Kosan tambien alcanzaron la meta de produccion de frutas.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 24 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion para hacer balance de la emulacion socialista de aumento de produccion.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Ri Chol Man, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ko In Ho, vicepremier y ministro de Agricultura, los funcionarios de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea y las unidades competidoras y los trabajadores agricolas.
					
					Tras publicarse el ranking, fueron otorgados los diplomas de honor y el galardon circulatorio de la emulacion.
					
					Fue anunciado el programa de emulacion socialista del dominio agricola para el ano 2017.
